reviews.review_msg: This was one of my worst SFU experiences. Lectures were impressively unorganized and uninspiring. If not for the weekly in-class group work I would've never attended. A disappoint since the topics covered in this course genuinely interest me. I don't appreciate having my time wasted, especially in upper division courses. I gained nothing from this.

Viviane was an ok prof. She was really nice, but she started her first lecture by essentially saying she was a PhD student, so if we had questions make sure they weren't questions answered somewhere else b/c she doesn't have time. Kind of disorganized, pretty much assigned readings and videos and didn't teach much. Grading was not clear.
